protocol.text: After 4 days of growth, during the subjective morning time, continuous red light-grown seedlings (R50) were directly harvested under red light, dark-grown seedlings (D) were harvested under safe dim green light (approximately 1 umol m-2 s-1 irradiance). For DR2h samples, dark-grown seedlings were exposed to red light (50 umol m-2 s-1 irradiance) for 2 hours before harvest under red light.

Surface sterilized seeds were sown on 1x MS salt medium solidified with 0.8% phytoagar, imbibed in darkness at 4 degree for 4 days, then exposed to white light for 3 hours to promote germination, and finally wrapped with aluminium foil for dark growth, or put into LED red light growth chamber for continuous red light growth (50 umol m-2 s-1 irradiance).
QIAGEN RNeasy Plant Mini kit was used to extract total RNA according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared using the GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit (Affymetrix) from 500ng total RNA according to the manufacturer's instructions.

Fifteen micrograms (15 ug) of aRNA were fragmented, and used for hybridization for 16 hr at 45 degree on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Array in the Hybridization Oven 640. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the 3000 GeneChip Scanner with Autoloader.
The data were analyzed in R/Bioconductor. Data were normalized with the 'RMA' function, ABS calls were obtained by Affymetrix GCOS algorithm, and statistical analysis were performed by LIMMA.
